title: President of Dickinson State University in North Dakota resigns after nursing faculty quit
creator: Via AP news wire
content: The president of Dickinson State University in North Dakota announced his resignation on Monday, days after the school's nursing faculty quit. In a video, Steve Easton announced his departure and acknowledged “turmoil between some in the faculty and the administration.” Seven faculty members resigned Wednesday, KFYR-TV reported. title: Paul Skenes in spotlight, starting All-Star Game after just 11 major league games
creator: By RONALD BLUM - AP Baseball Writer
content: ARLINGTON, Texas (AP) — Paul Skenes looked like a summer intern reporting for duty in a light gray suit, white shirt and cream-colored tie, teenage acne on his face and wonder in his voice. In a ballpark filled with six dozen All-Stars, the 22-year-old Pittsburgh Pirates pitcher with 11 major league appearances was the center of attention. “Pretty dang cool,” he said. Skenes is hot, like the 102-degree temperature outside air-conditioned Globe Life Field, and will start Tuesday's All-Star Game...

content: [스포츠영상] 한 선수의 홈런공 2개를 같은 사람이 가져갈 확률은? 야구장에서 홈런공 잡고 싶은 분들 많으시죠. 미국프로야구 메이저리그에서 말도 안 되는 일이 벌어졌습니다. 한 선수가 경기 중 홈런 2방을 쏘아 올렸는데, 2개 다 한 사람이 가져갔습니다. 로또 맞을 확률보다 더 희박할 것 같은 장면, 오늘의 영상으로 만나보시죠. 박수주 기자 (sooju@yna.co.kr) 연합뉴스TV 기사문의 및 제보 : 카톡/라인 jebo23 (끝)

title: Biden administration reacts to Trump assassination attempt
content: Biden administration reacts to Trump assassination attempt Homeland Security Secretary Alejandro Mayorkas called Saturday's shooting a security failure, though he insisted he still has confidence in Secret Service Director Kimberly Cheatle. As the Republican National Convention gets underway, the Biden team is moving cautiously to restart its own campaign advertising after pulling all ads this weekend as a sign of respect. Nancy Cordes has more.

title: Corrections & Amplifications
「とんとんと叩いただけ」缶ビール5箱持って店外へ 制止した従業員に裏拳 52歳男を逮捕〈仙台〉
content: 仙台市宮城野区のスーパーで缶ビールなどおよそ3万2000円分の商品を万引きした上、従業員に暴行を加えたとして無職の52歳の男が逮捕されました。 事後強盗の疑いで現行犯逮捕されたのは、宮城野区に住む無職の52歳の男です。 警察によりますと、男は15日午後3時40分ごろ、仙台市宮城野区のスーパーマーケットで商品11点(販売価格約3万2000円)を万引きした上、男性従業員(30)の左肩を押し、「裏拳」で腹をたたくなどの暴行を加えた疑いが持たれています。 警察によりますと、男が缶ビール5箱や弁当などをカートに載せてレジを通らず店の外へ出たのを不審に思い、男性従業員が「事務所についてきてください」などと男に声をかけたところ、男が男性に暴行を加えました。その後、男性を含む複数の従業員で男の身柄を確保し、警察に通報して逮捕につながったということです。 調べに対し、男は商品を盗んだことは認めているものの、暴行については「とんとんと叩いただけ」と容疑を一部否認しています。警察が当時の状況を詳しく調べています。...

title: MU thua đội bóng của Na Uy ở trận giao hữu đầu tiên trong mùa Hè 2024
content: Đêm 15/7, MU gặp Rosenborg trên SVĐ Lerkendal (Na Uy) trong bối cảnh HLV Ten Hag không có lực lượng mạnh nhất khi nhiều cầu thủ chưa trở lại CLB sau khi phục vụ ĐTQG. Trận đấu với đội bóng xếp thứ 8 ở giải VĐQG Na Uy là cơ hội để HLV Ten Hag thử nghiệm. Tuy nhiên trong hiệp 1, MU tỏ ra lép vế hơn so với Rosenborg. Đại diện của Na Uy cầm bóng tới 53% và tung ra 3 cú sút, trong khi "Quỷ đỏ" chỉ có 1 lần dứt...

title: Maduro entregó varias obras en Ciudad Guayana
creator: Fabiana Dos Reis
content: El presidente de la República, Nicolás Maduro, aprovechó su visita a Ciudad Guayana para hacer la entrega oficial de varias obras que fueron recuperadas a través de la Bricomiles. A través de la Ven App hicieron la denuncia de varias escuelas y CDI con algunos daños, por lo que envió cuadrillas para su recuperación completa. Es por ello que acudió a la Unidad Educativa Nacional “Luis Beltrán Prieto Figueroa” en Core 8 para hacer su entrega oficial. Junto con la ministra de Educación,...

title: How GOP vice presidential nominee Sen. JD Vance went from Trump critic to loyal ally
content: How GOP vice presidential nominee Sen. JD Vance went from Trump critic to loyal ally GOP presidential nominee Donald Trump announced in a social media post that he has selected JD Vance, a first-term senator from Ohio, as his vice presidential running mate. Ed O'Keefe and Major Garrett have more on how this former Trump critic beat out the other contenders and what he brings to the ticket.

title: Vingroup eyes Telangana for 1,000-acre smart city project
content: Hyderabad: After having broken ground for its 4,000 crore integrated electric vehicle (EV) manufacturing facility in Tamil Nadu through group company VinFast , Vietnamese conglomerate Vingroup has now set its sights on Telangana and Hyderabad, in particular. The Vietnamese giant is looking at the possibility of setting up a 1,000-acre mega smart city project in and around Hyderabad and has already begun scouting for options around the city, sources told TOI. title: Edmonton Elks fire head coach/GM Chris Jones after 0-5 start
creator: Canadian Press
content: EDMONTON — Close wasn't good enough for the Edmonton Elks, and Chris Jones has paid the price. The decision to fire the Elks' general manager and coach came down to one man: Rick LeLacheur. The Elks' president and CEO said no one else had input into the call. He informed the board of the community-owned CFL team Monday morning that Jones would be replaced, with Geroy Simon taking over as general manager, and offensive coordinator Jarious Jackson assuming interim head coaching duties. The team...

‘Good things always ending’: Ukrainian Village closing its doors at the end of the month
creator: Mackenzie Read
content: Victoria’s Ukrainian Village, which temporarily housed more than 100 refugees, is officially closing its doors at the end of the month. The village opened in the Kiwanis Village Society’s Heatherington House on Cook Street in Aug. 2022, providing a temporary space for families to start a new life after fleeing the war in their home country. It provided three months of free accommodation while refugees filed paperwork, found jobs, and secured more permanent housing. The three-month cap allowed a...

title: Uncle kills nephew over affair
Probe officer hand in glove with accused in rape case: Delhi court raps police
content: A local court recently pulled up the Delhi Police in a minor’s rape case for “misguiding” another court. The investigating officer was hand in glove with the accused so that he “could be released from judicial custody anyhow,” the Court observed. The accused was arrested under section 6 (aggravated penetrative sexual assault) of the Protection of Children from Sexual Offences (POCSO) Act. However, he was released following an order from a magisterial court, which can only try criminal matters...

content: Jul. 15—The complex legal battle over a controversial tax on high-end homes isn't done. Not even close. title: Trump officially chosen as GOP nominee after surviving assassination attempt
content: Trump officially chosen as GOP nominee after surviving assassination attempt Former President Donald Trump and fellow Republicans were all smiles in Milwaukee on Monday, a welcome change for them just days after Trump survived a harrowing assassination attempt in Pennsylvania. A boisterous roll call kicked off the RNC, cementing Trump as the party's nominee for a third straight time. Robert Costa reports.

title: California is 1st state to ban school rules requiring parents get notified of child’s pronoun change
content: California Gov. Gavin Newsom signed a first-in-the-nation law Monday barring school districts from passing policies that require schools to notify parents if their child asks to change their gender identification. The law bans rules requiring school staff to disclose a student’s gender identity or sexual orientation to any other person without the child’s permission. Proponents of the legislation say it will help protect LGBTQ+ students who live in unwelcoming households. But opponents say it...

content: ಬಿಹಾರ ಮತ್ತು ಆಂಧ್ರ ಪ್ರದೇಶ ರಾಜ್ಯದ ಅಭಿವೃದ್ಧಿಗಾಗಿ ‘ವಿಶೇಷ ವರ್ಗ ಸ್ಥಾನಮಾನ’ ನೀಡಬೇಕು ಎಂದು ಕೇಂದ್ರ ಸರ್ಕಾರವನ್ನು ಒತ್ತಾಯಿಸುತ್ತಿವೆ. ಕೇಂದ್ರ ಸರ್ಕಾರದ ಹಣಕಾಸು ನೀತಿಗಳಿಂದಾಗಿ ‘ವಿಶೇಷ ವರ್ಗ ಸ್ಥಾನಮಾನ’ ಎನ್ನುವುದು ಅಪ್ರಸ್ತುತವಾಗಿದೆ. ಈ ರಾಜ್ಯಗಳಿಗೂ, ಇತರ ರಾಜ್ಯಗಳಿಗೂ ವ್ಯತ್ಯಾಸವೇ ಇಲ್ಲದಂತಹ ಪರಿಸ್ಥಿತಿ ನಿರ್ಮಾಣವಾಗಿದೆ –––– ಕೇಂದ್ರದ ಎನ್‌ಡಿಎ ಸರ್ಕಾರದ ಪ್ರಮುಖ ಪಾಲುದಾರ ಪಕ್ಷ ಜೆಡಿಯು, ಬಿಹಾರಕ್ಕೆ ‘ವಿಶೇಷ ವರ್ಗ ಸ್ಥಾನಮಾನ’ (special category status) ನೀಡಬೇಕು ಎಂದು ಕೇಂದ್ರ ಸರ್ಕಾರವನ್ನು ಒತ್ತಾಯಿಸುತ್ತಿದೆ. ಇನ್ನೊಂದು ಪ್ರಮುಖ ಪಾಲುದಾರ ‍ತೆಲುಗು ದೇಶಂ ಕೂಡ...

title: Quinton Byfield agrees to a 5-year, $31.25 million contract extension with the Los Angeles Kings

content: EL SEGUNDO, Calif. (AP) — Forward Quinton Byfield has agreed to a five-year, $31.25 million contract extension with the Los Angeles Kings. The Kings announced the deal Monday for Byfield, the No. 2 overall pick in the 2020 NHL draft. The contract runs through the 2028-29 season. title: MP reviews smart city projects, calls for better coordination

content: ಜೀರಿಗೆಯು ಪ್ರತಿಯೊಬ್ಬರೂ ಅಡುಗೆಯಲ್ಲಿ ಬಳಸುವ ಒಂದು ಮಸಾಲೆಯಾಗಿದೆ. ಇದನ್ನು ಸೇವಿಸುವುದರಿಂದ ಆರೋಗ್ಯಕ್ಕೆ ಸಿಕ್ಕಾಪಟ್ಟೆ ಲಾಭಗಳಿವೆ. ಜೀರ್ಣಕ್ರಿಯೆಯಿಂದ ಹಿಡಿದು ತೂಕ ಕಡಿಮೆ ಮಾಡಿಕೊಳ್ಳುವವರೆಗೆ ಎಷ್ಟೆಲ್ಲಾ ಪ್ರಯೋಜನಗಳಿವೆ ಎನ್ನುವುದನ್ನು ತಿಳಿಯೋಣ.

title: BoM Q1 net up 47% to 1,293 crore
content: Pune: Bank of Maharashtra on Monday reported a growth of 47% in its net profit to Rs 1,293 crore in Q1FY25 as against Rs 882 crore in the previous year. Its operating profit improved to Rs 2,294 crore during the quarter as against Rs 1,863 crore for last year. Net Interest Income (NII) grew by almost 20% to Rs 2,799 crore while non-interest income improved to Rs 894 crore as against Rs 629 crore in Q1FY24. title: 鮑威爾:最新數據一定程度提升對通脹正回歸目標的信心
creator: auto_generator
content: 聯儲局主席鮑威爾表示,上季3組與美國通脹相關的數據表現,在一定程度上提升對通脹正持續向聯儲局2%目標靠近的信心,暗示可能無需等到通脹降至2%才減息。 鮑威爾在出席一個活動時表示,第2季在抑制通脹方面確實取得一些進展,已見到3組有所改善的數據,如果將數據平均來看,已在一個相當不錯的位置。但首季的數據未有令當局獲得更多信心。 他重申,聯儲局在對通脹朝著2%回落有更大信心之前,開始放鬆是不合適,目前仍在等待。 另外,三藩市聯儲銀行總裁戴利表示,通脹正朝著聯儲局2%目標邁進的信心正在增強,預計政策將在某個時間將進行調整,可能會減息幾次,但未有評論幾時開始減息。 她指,隨著時間推移,及隨著通脹回落和勞動力市場放緩,當局必須確保將利率維持在足夠高的水平,這樣與通脹的鬥爭就不會輸,但亦不會維持太久,不會讓勞動力市場惡化到令人找工作面臨挑戰的程度。 港股美國預託證券(ADR)普遍較本港收市下跌。 金融股方面,友邦和港交所ADR較本港收市跌逾1%,滙控則變動不大。 至於科技股,阿里巴巴和騰訊ADR較本港收市跌近1%或以上。

title: Oil Steadies as Traders Look to Dollar and China for Next Cues
creator: Bloomberg
content: (Bloomberg) -- Oil steadied after a two-day decline in quiet summer trading, with the outlook for the US dollar and monetary policy in focus. title: Cuándo terminan las temperaturas bajo cero en el Alto Valle y dónde hay alerta por lluvias para el miércoles
creator: Juan Francisco Amusategui Salaburu
content: La ola de frío continúa azotando Neuquén y Río Negro . Las temperaturas mínimas han llegado hasta -7°. La Autoridad Interjurisdiccional de Cuencas (AIC) publicó que las temperaturas mínimas volverán a estar sobre los cero grados esta semana en el Alto Valle. A partir del miércoles, las temperaturas mínimas en el Alto Valle subirán de los cero grados por primera vez en varias semanas. Se estima que entre el miércoles y el domingo oscilarán entre 1° y 4°. Las máximas se mantendrán...

title: Large library window smashed in Vernon
creator: Jennifer Smith
content: The local library has fallen victim to vandals. Staff showing up the Vernon branch Saturday morning discovered a large window was smashed near the entrance Saturday, July 6. Vernon North Okangan RCMP suspect the incident took place sometime during the night. "No suspects have been identified and the incident remains under investigation," said Cpl. Tania Finn, media relations officer.

title: Las remesas a Honduras suben un 2.6 % el primer semestre y suman 4.628 millones de dólares
creator: EFE
content: Tegucigalpa – Las remesas familiares que recibió Honduras durante el primer semestre de 2024 sumaron 4,628.5 millones de dólares, un aumento interanual de 2.6 %, según datos del Banco Central (BCH) consultados este lunes por EFE. Los envíos de dinero enviados a Honduras entre enero y junio aumentaron 118.7 millones de dólares con relación al mismo período de 2023 (4.509,8 millones de dólares), indicó el emisor del Estado en un informe. Solo durante junio pasado, los hondureños que...

creator: Tim Scott
content: A 76-year-old Dunedin driver crashed into a convenience store fence after mistaking the accelerator for the brake. The crash happened in Main South Rd, Green Island, at about 12pm yesterday. The woman had ‘‘pressed the accelerator instead of the brake’’ and crashed her vehicle through the fence in the On the Spot carpark, Senior Sergeant Anthony Bond, of Dunedin, said. No injuries were reported and no alcohol was involved, Snr Sgt Bond said. tim.scott@odt.co.nz

content: रामबास गांव में 13 जुलाई को एक शादी समारोह में फायरिंग का वीडियो आया सामने संवाद न्यूज एजेंसी चरखी दादरी/झोझूकलां। रामबास गांव में आयोजित एक शादी समारोह में हर्ष फायरिंग करना दो लोगों को महंगा पड़ गया। सोशल मीडिया पर वायरल हुए फायरिंग के वीडियो पर संज्ञान लेकर झोझूकलां थाना पुलिस ने झज्जर जिले के गांव डीघल निवासी दीपक और एक अन्य पर केस दर्ज कर लिया है। पुलिस से मिली जानकारी के अनुसार, सोशल मीडिया पर एक वीडियो वायरल हुआ। वीडियो की जांच की गई तो पता चला कि यह वीडियो रामबास गांव का है। इसके बाद...

title: Embajadora Dogu se reúne con presidenta del BCH para tratar de impulsar crecimiento económico de Honduras
creator: Proceso Digital
content: Tegucigalpa – La embajadora de Estados Unidos, Laura Dogu, sostuvo este lunes una reunión con la presidenta del Banco Central de Honduras (BCH), Rebeca Santos, para conversar sobre impulsar el crecimiento económico del país. Asimismo, posteó en la cuenta de red social “X” que trataron en cómo mejorar las oportunidades para los hondureños. Dogu valoró la colaboración y reafirmó el compromiso de EEUU con una visión compartida de un futuro próspero para Honduras. AG

title: Activist Starboard builds over 6.5% stake in Tinder owner Match, WSJ reports
creator: Reuters
content: (Reuters) - Activist investor Starboard has a position in Tinder owner Match of more than 6.5% and is pushing for a possible sale if a turnaround isn't successful, the Wall Street Journal reported on Monday, citing people familiar with the matter. Shares of Match rose nearly 9% in extended trading following the report. Starboard believes Match should improve Tinder, which represents more than half of the company's total revenue, and also sees opportunities for the Hinge business among other...

creator: Via AP news wire
content: Bolivia's embattled president on Monday announced the discovery of vast natural gas reserves, describing it as the biggest find in nearly two decades that could help the cash-strapped country reverse its falling production. President Luis Arce called the trove just north of the capital a “mega field," saying it has some 1.7 trillion cubic meters of gas at a likely market value of $6.8 billion. title: Knicks add Cameron Payne to bolster guard depth
creator: Christian Arnold
content: Free agent guard Cameron Payne has a new home just a short trip away from his old one. Payne has agreed to a one-year, $3.1 million deal with the Knicks, The Athletic’s Shams Charania reported on Monday. Payne is coming off a season where he averaged 9.3 points per game and 1.8 rebounds while adding 3.1 assists in 31 games with the 76ers. The guard had been a fan favorite in Philly and was viewed as one of the best backup guards still on the open market.

title: Borrowers must get 21-day notice before fraud tag: RBI
content: MUMBAI: RBI has barred banks from unilaterally categorising borrowers as fraud without giving them a hearing. RBI has said banks must give a 21-day show-cause notice to the defaulter, giving them an opportunity to present their case before classifying the account as fraud. RBI has revised its guidelines in response to a Supreme Court order from last year. RBI has asked banks to put in place a board-approved policy on fraud risk management which specifies the responsibilities of the board. "The...

creator: Sophie Austin, The Associated Press
content: SACRAMENTO, Calif. (AP) — California Gov. Gavin Newsom signed a first-in-the-nation law Monday barring school districts from passing policies that require schools to notify parents if their child asks to change their gender identification. The law bans rules requiring school staff to disclose a student’s gender identity or sexual orientation to any other person without the child’s permission. title: La tomba di “maestra Vincenzina” ridotta ad un cumulo di macerie
creator: Paolo Loche RIPRODUZIONE RISERVATA
content: Versa in stato di totale abbandono e degrado, nel cimitero di Pirri, la tomba di Vincenzina Murgia (1858-1945), storica maestra di Pirri alla quale è stata intitolata anche una strada, a Barracca Manna. Vincenzina iniziò ad insegnare a 25 anni. La sua opera pluridecennale di formazione delle giovani generazioni pirresi, per la quale ricevette riconoscimenti a livello nazionale, proseguì fino al 1914. title: La festa si chiude tra le polemiche
creator: Giovanni Lorenzo Porrà
content: Tra “Cheri cheri lady” dei Modern Talking e “I’m blue” degli Eiffel 65, lo scorso sabato sera nel dj set di Sandro Murru al termine della Festa della Birra hanno ballato migliaia di persone a Sestu. Una serata di musica anni ’70, ’80, ’90 che ha richiamato tantissimi giovani e meno giovani nel nuovo piazzale Campioni d’Italia, e anche il primo evento così grande qui. Festa e polemiche Ma le conseguenze, che sembrano inevitabili, in questi casi, si sono viste la mattina dopo: un tappeto di...

title: 4 Killed, Several Injured As Bus Falls Into Ditch On Mumbai Expressway
content: Officials said that the bus was carrying devotees. (Representational) Four people were killed and several others were injured after a bus they were travelling in collided with a tractor and plunged into a ditch near the Mumbai Express highway on the intervening night of Monday and Tuesday, police said. According to officials, all the injured were admitted to a nearby hospital. "Four people died and several others were injured after a bus collided with a tractor and fell into a ditch near the...
